title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for running Llama 2, Code Llama, and other large language models locally with GPU/CPU inference.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client and asyncio bindings; chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration allowing Ollama models as LLM, chat, or embedding provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat interface, model management, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, chat history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into inline suggestions and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma to chat with local PDFs and notes.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfiles and quantization recipes for Llama-3, Phi-3, Gemma, Mistral, etc.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JavaScript/TypeScript bindings to Ollama REST API.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for synchronous and asynchronous interaction with Ollama.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama with tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app with session memory, model selector, and token-throughput metrics.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (cuda/cpu) and docker-compose snippets for development & production.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models as Generator or Embedder node.

title: ollama-lmstudio-bridge
summary: Bridge that exposes Ollama local models through LM Studio’s OpenAI-compatible server.

title: reddit/r/ollama
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, benchmarks, and ecosystem announcements.
